i1.name: Way of the Hunter
description: {{sbc|Innate - Intent:}} '''Yone''' doubles his {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} from all other sources, but his {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} deal only {{as|{{critical damage|80|add=true}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Duality:}} '''Yone's''' {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} alternate between using his {{as|Steel Sword|Steel}} and {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} {{tip|on-attack}}. '''Yone''' begins attacking with his {{as|Steel Sword|Steel}}, and basic attacks with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} deal {{as|50% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|50% AD}} {{as|magic damage}}.
i1.notes:
* There is no attack time out between alternating swords.
** It will ''persist through {{tip|death}}''.
** Only the cast of {{ai|Soul Unbound|Yone}} resets his next attack to restart the cycle.
* 50% of {{ii|Sheen|icononly = true}} {{nies|Spellblade}} damage will be converted to {{as|magic damage}} if applied by the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.
** This will also occur if applied by {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit'' after having last attacked with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.
** This will also occur if applied by {{ai|Mortal Steel|Yone}} after having last attacked with the {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}}.{{bug}}
* The mixed damage is dealt in two simultaneous instances of damage, but will pretend to be a single instance for most effects (such as {{ris|Conqueror}} stacks).
** Even if the target dies from the {{as|physical damage}} dealt, the {{as|magic damage}} will still be applied to it.

q1.name: Mortal Steel
q1.target_range: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|475|Thrust range}} / {{tt|450|Dash distance}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|950|Whirlwind missile range}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' thrusts his {{as|Steel Sword}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects to the first enemy hit. ''Mortal Steel'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|60|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Mortal Steel'' hits an enemy with the thrust, '''Yone''' gains a ''Gathering Storm'' [[stack]] for 6 seconds.

While '''Yone''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'', ''Mortal Steel'' consumes the stacks to instead cause him to {{tip|dash}} a fixed distance in the target direction and unleash a whirlwind travelling the same direction, both dealing the same damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit in their path for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

{{tt|''Mortal Steel's'' thrust|Not when at two stacks}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Yone''' is affected by [[Crowd_control#Loss_of_Control|hard crowd control]] during the cast time but its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset to {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
q1.notes:
* ''Mortal Steel'' is not affected by {{ai|Way of the Hunter|Yone}}.
* ''Mortal Steel'' applies {{tip|basic damage}} for {{tt|the first (closest) enemy hit|including enemies hit by the dash}} and {{tip|area damage}} for secondary enemies:
** ''Mortal Steel'' will apply [[on-hit]] effects to the first target hit, but will not do so to the secondary ones.
** ''Mortal Steel'' will not apply [[ability effects|spell effects]] to the first target hit, but will do so to the secondary ones.
** {{stil|Spell vamp}} and {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} will only grant {{tip|heal|healing}} from the damage dealt to secondary targets, and healing is reduced to 33% effectiveness, accordingly.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will heal based on the damage dealt to the first target hit.
* After a successful crit roll against one of the targets, ''Mortal Steel's'' thrust is guaranteed to {{tip|critically strike}} all further targets aswell.{{bug}}
** This is unlike the behaviour of {{cai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo}}.
** The whirlwind and dash roll their critical strike against each target individually.
* '''Yone's''' collision path and the traveling whirlwind each cannot affect the same enemy twice.
** {{tip|Blink|Blinking}} during ''Mortal Steel's'' cast with two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'' (after the cast time) will end the dash prematurely but enemies in range of '''Yone''' at the new location are affected. The whirlwind's trajectory cannot be changed once it has already been unleashed.
* Only the whirlwind can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* Each parry has different interactions with this ability, whether it's the first target of ''Mortal Steel'' or the secondary one. In either case '''Yone''' still gains a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' and his whirlwind {{tip|airborne|knock up}} cannot be negated by parries:
** {{tip|Dodge}} and {{tip|Block}}: first target '''does not''' deal damage, secondary target '''does''' deal damage.
** {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Blind}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Yone''' from receiving a stack.
* ''Mortal Steel'' is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} if '''Yone''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm''.
* While at two stacks, a range indicator will be shown for the effective range of the whirlwind.
* The {{tip|dash}} can cross terrain.
* ''Mortal Steel'' will cast from wherever '''Yone''' is at the end of the cast time.
** '''Yone''' will always cast ''Mortal Steel'' in his facing direction, although the ability input will still cause him to face in the target direction. While at two stacks, '''Yone''' will always cast it in the target direction.

w1.name: Spirit Cleave
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' cleaves with his {{as|Azakana Sword|azakana}} in the target direction, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage to enemies hit in a cone. The '''total''' mixed damage has a minimum threshold of {{pp|30+10*x for 8;then + 20*x for 5;then + 40*x for 5|formula=30 + 10 per level until lvl 8, then + 20 per level until lvl 13, then + 40 per level}} against {{tip|minions}} and a maximum threshold of {{pp|140+10*x for 18|formula=140 + 10 per level}} against {{tip|monsters}}.

'''Yone''' {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{passive progression/deprecated version|40 to 60}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds if ''Spirit Cleave'' hits an enemy, increased by {{passive progression/deprecated version|5|100 to 200|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|label1=number of enemy champions hit|label2=shield increase|key=%}}.
w1.notes:
* Despite ''Spirit Cleave'' generally hitting targets' {{tip|edge range}}, it ''cannot'' hit targets whose center is behind him.
** This behaviour is common with [[Projectile|missiles]], however some cone spells such as this one also do it.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Yone''' from receiving the {{tip|shield}}.
* ''Spirit Cleave'' will cast from wherever '''Yone''' is at the end of the cast time.
** '''Yone''' will always cast ''Spirit Cleave'' in his facing direction, although the ability input will still cause him to face in the target direction.
* The mixed damage is applied in two instances, and the {{as|physical damage}} will be dealt first within the same game tick.
** If the {{as|physical damage}} finishes off the unit, the {{as|magic damage}} will not be dealt against it.{{bug}}

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ {{ap|11 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5.5 to 7.5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Magic Damage|{{ap|5 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|5.5 to 7.5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
effects.str:
• Total Mixed Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)
  • Physical Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)
  • Magic Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health)

e1.name: Soul Unbound
e1.target_range: {{tt|300|Initial dash range and body distance in the opposite direction}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yone''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, gaining ''Spirit Form'' for 5 seconds as well as creating an {{tip|untargetable}} {{tip|clone}} that is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain. After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Yone''' can recast ''Soul Unbound''.

{{sbc|Spirit Form:}} '''Yone's''' gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|11|10 to 30|0 to 3|key=%|type=time active|label1=time since the start of the dash|label2=bonus movement speed}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and ''marks'' champions damaged with [[basic attack]]s or [[champion ability|abilities]]. Each mark stores a percentage of the {{tt|post-mitigation|Damage calculated after modifiers}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|magic damage}} that '''Yone''' deals to them with his basic attacks and abilities.
Activation resets {{ais|Way of the Hunter|Yone}} current state.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yone''' casts for {{fd|0.25}} seconds then {{tip|dashes}} back to his body, detonating the ''marks'' on each champion to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to the amount stored against them. '''Yone''' is {{tip|unstoppable}} from the point of re-activation until the dash is completed, and he will {{tip|cleanse}} himself from all {{tip|blind|blinds}}, {{tip|cripple|cripples}}, and {{tip|drowsy}} effects as well as any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects that were applied to him during the {{tt|cast time|within the 0.25 seconds period}}.

After the duration ends, ''Soul Unbound'' will recast automatically. The automatic recast is delayed if '''Yone''' is unable to move or cast due to crowd control, channeling or a lock-out. ''Soul Unbound'' will also recast upon {{tip|death}}.
e1.notes:
* ''Soul Unbound'' stays on cooldown for the first 15 seconds of the game.
<!--Spirit Form-->
* ''Soul Unbound's'' duration starts after the recast is available. The bonus movement speed's duration starts on-cast.
* {{si|Recall}} and {{si|Teleport}} are disabled during ''Soul Unbound''.
* Only '''Yone's''' initial dash can be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}. '''Yone''' will still gain ''Spirit Form''.
* '''Yone's''' orange [[resource]] bar during ''Soul Unbound'' is indicative of the effect's duration. The amount starts at 500 and rapidly decays down to 0.
** With {{fd|0.5}} seconds remaining before the effect ends or when the bar reaches 105, a distinct sound will cue and the edges of the [[summoner|player's]] screen will briefly turn a faint dark. This is visible to '''Yone's''' perspective only.
* '''Yone's''' "body" is just a glorified {{ai|Distortion|LeBlanc|Return Pad}}, despite being implemented as a [[champion summoned unit]]. It has no visible [[health bar]] and remains idle until despawned by the ability.
** The {{tip|clone|body}} cannot be teleported by an allied {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}.
<!--Recast-->
* ''Soul Unbound's'' recast, even when cast automatically, counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}}, charging {{ii|Spellbinder}}, and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Soul Unbound's'' recast does not reset '''Yone's''' last movement or attack order.
* ''Soul Unbound's'' recast is notable for being an ability that {{tip|cleanse|removes}} {{tip|crowd control}} but cannot be activated while unable to cast abilities or mobility spells due to the same crowd control.
* Some examples of effects that will delay ''Soul Unbound's'' automatic recast: 
** Performing {{ai|Fate Sealed|Yone}}.
** {{tip|attack windup|Winding up}} an attack.
** Being in [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]].
** {{tip|Dash|Dashing}}.
** {{tip|Channel|Channeling}}.
** Being {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilized}}, {{tip|Silence|Silenced}}, or {{tip|Ground|Grounded}}.
** {{tip|Resurrection|Resurrecting}}.
** Becoming {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench|Devoured}} (ally and enemy).
** Staying in {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}.
*** '''Yone''' instantly appears at his body's location the moment this effect ends.
* If '''Yone''' {{tip|death|dies}} with ''Spirit Form'', he will still dash back to his {{tip|clone|body}} while dead. Once he arrives, his death animation will play.
<!--Damage-->
* The marks do not store damage from [[item]]s, [[rune]]s and [[summoner spell]]s.
* The mark also automatically detonates without '''Yone''' having to recast when the marked champion dies or enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* The detonation damage cannot be dodged by becoming {{tip|untargetable}}.

r1.name: Fate Sealed
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After the cast time, '''Yone''' ''marks'' all enemies in a line in the target direction and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for {{fd|0.15}} seconds as well as {{tip|blink|blinking}} {{tt|200 units beyond the center of the last enemy champion struck|Can place him beyond maximum range}}. If no enemy champions are struck, '''Yone''' {{tip|blink|blinks}} to the {{tt|maximum range|uses center range}} instead.

After a further {{fd|0.125}} seconds, wind rushes along the same line, dealing ''marked'' enemies that are within the area equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage while {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them towards '''Yone's''' blinking position and subsequently {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
'''Yone''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} for a total of {{fd|0.3}} seconds upon blinking.
''Fate Sealed'' benefits from {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
r1.notes:
* ''Marked'' enemies that are not within the area will not be affected by the second portion of the ability.
* If ''Fate Sealed's'' maximum range is inside terrain, enemies will not be {{tip|airborne|pulled}} through walls.
* ''Fate Sealed'' '''can''' hit targets whose center is behind '''Yone''', if their {{tip|edge range|radius}} overlaps with the rectangle hitbox in front of him.
* Enemies are {{tip|airborne|pulled}} with 3000 speed.
* ''Fate Sealed'' will cast from wherever '''Yone''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Yone''' can blink up to 1200 units + enemy [[size]], if the last enemy champion's radius intersects with the maximum range slightly.
* Despite {{stil|life steal}} healing from 100% of the damage dealt, the spell deals {{tip|area damage}} so other healing effects such as {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} apply aswell but may be reduced to 33% effectiveness.
* The mixed damage is applied in two instances, and the {{as|magic damage}} will be dealt first within the same game tick.
** If the {{as|magic damage}} finishes off the unit, the {{as|physical damage}} will not be dealt against it.{{bug}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} can block the initial {{tip|stun}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: Damage, pull, and knock up.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock up}} starts once the pull ends.
* '''Yone''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of performing actions for {{fd|0.3}} seconds after the cast time. ''Fate Sealed'' is not cancelled if '''Yone''' dies during this time.
** The following table refers for interactions while '''Yone''' is ''locked-out'' and in cast time:
{{ct|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=revival-false}}
